title: Famous Fake Books
description: Famous book frauds, fake books, books that have been merely "questioned," modern and ancient fictional apocrypha, Clifford Irving, Howard Hughes, a book optioned by James Cameron, director of "Titanic," a novel by a Harvard Sophomore, "A Million Little Pieces," plus much, much more, until you think you're ready to write your own fake book.
author: John Blandly
